channel.title: Overall results on Historial Land Conflict
channel.description: Recent content in Overall results on Historial Land Conflict

item.title: Main Results
item.description: In general, we found that 59% of the geographical area belong to \emph{Similar tribes} of Murdock and Greg (27% of total intersections). Classification of Murdock-GREG Intersections For those tribes that are \emph{Similar/Equivalent} we analyze the level of its relation (see \ref{fig_same_detail}).

item.title: Why Different
item.description: Establishing the reason why a specific geographical area is considered a homeland of two different tribes in Murdock and GREG is not always straightforward. We initially collect information from three main sources: (i) Wikipedia, (ii) eHRAF World Cultures , and (iii) country-specific books.
